tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Hemlock
programme.desc: By mistake a foreign agent sends a fax to Meg's office; then he retrieves it and shoots Meg to prevent her from identifying him.(n)

programme.title: JAG: High Ground
programme.desc: A Marine sniper receives orders contrary to a previous deal; his CO refuses to listen; the sniper takes a shot at the CO's Humvee.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Smoked
programme.desc: After a lightning strike, an F-14 wanders into Cuban airspace, and Cuban fighters force it to land.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Black Ops
programme.desc: A Naval aviator, while temporarily assigned to a SEAL team, drowns at sea; he was the son of a woman senator.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Survivors
programme.desc: In a civilian court Harm represents a divorced (and emotionally baffled) Marine colonel, who has gotten into trouble over an unauthorized visit with his minor son.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Chernobyl Intentions
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes to Chernobyl to repair the decaying nuclear reactor before a catastrophic meltdown.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must out-think their unstable ex-Scorpion member after he kidnaps Toby and threatens to kill him unless his cunning demands are met.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Civil War
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must put aside their personal and romantic predicaments when anonymous hackers with unknown motives take control of U.S. military aircraft and warships and point weapons at American cities.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: And More Civil War
programme.desc: Just as Team Scorpion makes headway against the hackers controlling U.S. naval destroyers, they learn that a U.S. nuclear submarine also has been hacked and has a missile about to launch.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.sub-title: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.desc: When Walter is accidentally launched into space in a rocket, he hallucinates about Paige as his oxygen runs low, and Team Scorpion works feverishly to find a way to bring him home before he suffocates.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must find a boy from Ralph's class who goes missing on a field trip after he accidentally has a run-in with a deadly criminal. Also, Toby gets closer to finding out the identity of Happy's husband.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team visit this deserted old mansion which is way past its original splendour. They are soon surrounded by unexplained activity as something is following them and for at least two members of crew, they are pushed to their very limits.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to the mysterious Guys Cliffe House, once a private dwelling, it is now home to the Fraternal Brotherhood of Freemasons. The team are followed by a very persistent poltergeist that will seem to stop at nothing to get their attention.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: From the start activity prevalent in this historical building. Glen is faced with something unexplained early on, Gregg is faced with his most demanding vigil yet and the rest of team chase a sinister shadow that lurks in the dark corridor.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation, moving from the cellar to the upper floors. While Yvette and Glen explore the auditorium, something follows Karl upstairs, and the rest of the team captures some of their best evidence yet.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: An all but deserted manor house that boasts murder, death and intrigue among its history becomes the setting for one of the most intriguing investigation to date. The team are showered with object that appear to land in the same way.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunted Hotel
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS drivesto the Otesaga Resort Hotel in Cooperstown, NY. Employees are terrified by voices calling out to themand doors swinging all on their own.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Residual Haunts
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Prospect, Maine to investigate Fort Knox, built before the Civil War to protect the Penobscot narrows.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Knights of the Living Dead
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Worcester, Massachusetts to investigate the Higgins Armory, the only armory in the western hemisphere devoted to arms and armor.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her sister ship, the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Music of a Distant Drum
programme.desc: Tyr crash lands the Eureka Maru on a Nietzschean planet and develops amnesia. He must remember what he is doing before the Nietzscheans discover him and his crate of stolen goods.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Harper 2.0
programme.desc: Harper receives the gift of knowledge from a dying Perseid, only to discover that the Perseid was being sought by a bounty hunter who has now turned his attention to Harper.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Forced Perspective
programme.desc: Dylan is arrested for assassinating a dictator 300 years ago.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Sum of Its Parts
programme.desc: Andromeda is boarded by a drone from the Consensus of Parts, a mythical mechanical society. While friendly at first, the drone tries to force the ship to join the Consensus.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.sub-title: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.desc: Gerentex is back, and demands Trance and Harper help him with his new scheme: finding Tarn-Vedra.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.19
programme.desc: Man alleges ex-girlfriend ordered escort attack in bar; she denies and countersues for dirt bike balance, car vandalism, and harassment/Trashed hotel room after 18th birthday sparks damages lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.86
programme.desc: Botched deal to trade babysitting for rent leaves ex-roommates fighting over dumped clothes and unpaid bills. Woman accuses friend of kidnapping her kids during her jail time, refuses to repay dental loan.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.206
programme.desc: Furniture left out in the snow, an alleged campaign to ruin an ex-\t\t\t\r\nlover’s reputation, and an alleged assault in a car come into play\t\t\t\r\nwhen ex-lovers who met online call it quits.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.212
programme.desc: Ex-friends fight over charges on an allegedly stolen credit card.\t\t\t\r\nA man admits that he smashed his ex-girlfriend’s cell phone after reading her texts to another man and claims she is responsible for his belongings being stolen.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.127
programme.desc: 11-year-old girl accused of pouring scalding water on 5-year-old boy; mothers fight over liability and medical expenses/A man sues horse trainer for saddle return; granddaughter sold it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.165
programme.desc: Man sues ex over alleged false restraining order; denies gun threat. Mother with concerns about son's spending keeps his money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.170
programme.desc: $6,000 spent on a dog’s pacemaker and rattlesnake-bite medical bills are contested by a Good Samaritan animal rescuer who hated to see “Ginger” eventually put down.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.11
programme.desc: A daycare provider sues for slander after parents claim she was unlicensed, negligent, and had alcohol on the premises/Two boxers and a German Shepherd allegedly jump on a car and scratch the paint; ex-friends fight over damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.259
programme.desc: A young tenant disputes custody of a band's equipment and unpaid rent with former landlords. Man sues seller and girlfriend for refund after alleged failed vehicle purchase from online ad.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.104
programme.desc: Woman accuses fiancé of infidelity while she's in hospital; accused of car vandalism/Woman sues ex-friend for selling fridge she loaned him.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.238
programme.desc: A woman sues her older daughter over a case involving her emancipated teenager. Ex-lovers dispute car payments, insurance, and property return.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs compete against a team of former runners-up in a dinner-service showdown.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each of the chefs try to teach a student how to re-create one of Ramsay's signature dishes, before serving an Italian-themed finale.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: World renowned chef Gordon Ramsay puts 12 aspiring young chefs through rigorous and devastating challenges at his restaurant in Hollywood.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: World renowned chef Gordon Ramsay puts 12 aspiring young chefs through rigorous and devastating challenges at his restaurant in Hollywood.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The competition concludes as the two finalists battle it out for the position of head chef at Gordon Ramsay Steak at the Paris Las Vegas.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Twenty aspiring restaurateurs present their signature dishes to Ramsay -- and an audience -- in Las Vegas; while the challenge winners earn a night out on the town, the losers must head back to Los Angeles on a school bus.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Day
programme.desc: When Jeff proclaims it's 'Jeff Day', he gets his way until the cleaning lady arrives. Meanwhile, Adam has to figure out why his eye is twitching.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Zygote
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey see a fertility specialist with their surrogate, they discover a zygote. Meanwhile, Russell and Timmy go on double dates again.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Set Up
programme.desc: When Russell discovers Timmy has a sister, he aims to impress her. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey set their neighbor Liz up on a date.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Jeff Photo
programme.desc: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life. Meanwhile, Russell experiences a slump with women until he sees a familiar face.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Crime Don't Pay
programme.desc: Today the crew is hunting for Holly, a car thief. She's one of Tim's bonds and the entire Dog crew knows that means trouble - or at least a long and difficult chase.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Photo Op
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Willie Hunting
programme.desc: While many of the guys' wives and children are in Africa doing charity work, Willie and Jase get into a debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge--can Jase and Si track and capture Willie and Jep?(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sleep Cover
programme.desc: With Korie still in Africa, Willie and Jep must step in and supervise Bella's sleepover. When a couple boys play a prank on the girls, Willie and Jep prove to be the perfect chaperones for the task.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drive-In Revivin'
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.(n)

programme.title: Meteor Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this End Times thriller, a gigantic meteor enters Earth's orbit and begins to disintegrate, showering the planet in poisonous debris.(n)

programme.title: Native
programme.desc: Two scientists are selected to travel across the universe to the source of a distant transmission and potential life.(n)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: In 2050, 86-year-old Marjorie has a holographic companion who resembles her dead husband and is programmed to feed her the story of her life. With Lois Smith, Jon Hamm, Geena Davis.(n)

programme.title: A Boy Called Sailboat
programme.desc: A small family finds hope in their extraordinary son named Sailboat when a personal gesture awakens a global desire.(n)

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.(n)

programme.title: Relative Values
programme.desc: When a star and Hollywood Diva Miranda Frayle brek up, a playboy prince with a stiff upper lip sweeps her off her feet and boldly takes her home to meet his high class society minded mother.(n)

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Switch
programme.desc: Through Eddie's wit and guile, he gives Sam that last night and finally finds the real meaning of Christmas the gambler's way.(n)

programme.title: Under the Mistletoe
programme.desc: Starring Jaime Ray Newman, Michael Shanks, and Conan Graham. At Christmas, the tables turn on a selfless single mom when a local radio station takes over her love life after an innocent call from her 8-year-old son.(n)

programme.title: Beaus Of Holly
programme.desc: Holly proposes to Phil, he confesses he needs to work things out with his ex. Having booked a romantic sleigh ride, Holly pours her heart out to the sleigh driver, Jake. Is Phil really for her, or is Jake the Christmas miracle she's been searching for?(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: Love You To Death
programme.desc: Talented attorney Yasmine Winter freezes in court, and her mistake allows a murderer go free. Her boss orders her to take a sabbatical but secretly, Yasmine plans to use the time away to rebuild the case she just lost.(n)

programme.title: American Exit
programme.desc: A dying father takes a road trip with his son, to try to rebuild his relationship before he dies.(n)

programme.title: French Silk
programme.desc: In steamy New Orleans, a police detective doesn't know whether to arrest his prime suspect or make love to her after he unexpectedly finds himself in a passionate affair with an accused killer.(n)

programme.title: Evil Doctor
programme.desc: Expectant parents Aubrey and Matt find their lives haunted, and their marriage tested, by an unhinged OB GYN with a mysterious past and who is after their child.(n)

programme.title: Madea's Witness Protection
programme.desc: Placed under federal protection in Madea's (Tyler Perry) Southern home, a Wall Street banker (Eugene Levy) and his dysfunctional family get a taste of the no-nonsense matriarch's special brand of tough love.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: A madman forces young friends to kill one another to try to survive a sadistic game.(n)

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: A Southern matriarch (Tyler Perry) deals with a host of personal and family issues while planning her clan's upcoming reunion.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: Kitty pits friends Joe and Gabe against each other as she convinces Joe to run against Gabe for sheriff.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Pioneer Doctor
programme.desc: Dr. Charles Edwards arrives in a rough frontier town to set up practice.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Stubborn Mule Hill
programme.desc: The man Kit Carson saved from death in the desert turns out to be his wife's ex-fiance.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Blinded in an explosion, Lucas fights despair as he prepares for a meeting with a gun-toting enemy.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deranged ex-prisoner of war, cruelly abused in a Northern army prison, captures Lucas, locks him in a cage and vows to make him suffer for his part in the Civil War.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman can't talk his way out of an assault charge.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.sub-title: Short Rope for a Tall Man
programme.desc: Lucas is threatened with hanging by a lynch party when some horses he has purchased in a neighboring town turn out to be stolen.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A janitor-turned-gunfighter's reputation hangs on one lucky shot and a lot of gall. The handyman finds himself in trouble when he accidentally kills another gunfighter.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to get help when he is shot after witnessing a murder.(n)

programme.title: For The Love Of Benji
programme.desc: Benji is back! En route to a vacation in Greece Benji becomes separated from the family in Athens, Benji finds himself on the run from an assortment of international spies seeking an energy scientist, who has been working on a secret formula.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Robo Rex
programme.desc: James Miller has only one friend in the world, his beloved Labrador Retriever, Rex. But when a strange capsule lands in the his backyard and a robot dog emerges, his life will never be the same.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Inspired by the classic fairy-tale, we follow a young girl who meets an enchanting woman she believes to be the real “Little Mermaid”. Starring: William Moseley, Poppy Drayton, Loreto Peralta.(n)

programme.title: Time Toys
programme.desc: A group of kids stumble upon a chest full of toys from the future. The discovery takes them on an adventure using their new-found toys to save their neighbourhood and the world from a maniacal madman. A fun, futuristic adventure for all the family.(n)

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren, grieving his wife, shuns kindness. Leah, mourning her husband, pours her soul into singing. Oren's son leaves Sarah with him. Despite their loneliness, Sarah may spark a transformation, turning their home into a Little Shangri-La.(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season: The Winning Season
programme.desc: The story of a washed up basketball coach who must learn to overcome his love of booze and his overdeveloped macho nature in order to re-invent himself as a real man and give a bunch of no-hopers a shot at a WINNING SEASON!(n)

programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.(n)

programme.title: Cottage to Let
programme.desc: Nazis try to learn the plans and location of a secret bomb sight in Scotland from an Allied scientist.(n)

programme.title: Blackmail
programme.desc: A Scotland Yard inspector deals with a blackmailer who knows that the lawman's fiancee killed an artist.(n)

programme.title: Circus of Horrors
programme.desc: Tale about a renegade plastic surgeon on the run from the police, who becomes the owner of a run-down circus. Before long, the performers experience a series of horrific accidents.(n)

programme.title: Night of the Eagle
programme.desc: A sceptical college professor learns the true power of the occult when he attempts to rescue his wife from Satanists.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a paraplegic Vietnam vet who struggles to keep his roommate from committing suicide. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: While Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of an escaped serial killer who is holding a woman and her daughter (Connie Ray, Beverley Mitchell) hostage, the real killer (Cameron Dye) escapes from Al (Dean Stockwell).(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the body of an elderly man who stumbles upon a government investigation into UFO sightings. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps back into the life of a disabled man whose life he touched two years earlier; Sam (Scott Bakula) and Al (Dean Stockwell) meet their nemesis in Alia and Zoey (Renee Coleman, Carolyn Seymour).(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a Louisiana sheriff who is investigating a murder that the townspeople believe was committed by his 10-year-old daughter (Kimberly Cullum). Guest star: Mary Gordon Murray. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Third Thing (REDUX)
programme.desc: The the in-brain reality TV series "The Third Thing", follow the crew of the Trans-Utopian. Marcus, is given the job of capturing a petty criminal for the show. As the "simple" mission unfolds, it becomes much deadlier than it seemed.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Torment (REDUX)
programme.desc: Percy, Travis, and crew try to rescue a man's parents caught in a cruel time-dilation trap; kidnapped years earlier into a high-speed orbit, they only age 8 months relative to their son's 50 years.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Painless (REDUX)
programme.desc: Roan, a friend of the Montana family, is killed by Anestha, a new street drug. As Travis hunts for Bliss, a narcotics ringleader, he stumbles upon a deep scam that could only happen in the 23rd century.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Skin Deep (REDUX)
programme.desc: Callie's reunion with old friend Lena goes awry when a rival starhunter attempts to arrest Lena for murder. Percy and Marcus leave the ship to buy an anti-matter stabilizer, but the deal goes poorly and the two find themselves stranded in Io's Syn City.(n)

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Shadow Bomb
programme.desc: Peter is called in after a malfunction with a light sensitive bomb and must disarm the weapon before approaching darkness makes detonation inevitable.(n)

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Big Plot
programme.desc: Found among the wreckage of a crashed plane are parts of an atomic bomb and Peter uncovers a plot to start a Third World War.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)
